definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: set, install (As. nasâku, id., whence nasîku, prince, Dl:HWB 472; v. also Muss-Arnolt:Hbr. vi. 89. R. 17 and reff.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[נׇסַכְתִּי מַלְכִּי עַל־חִיּוֹן]] Ps 2:6 I have installed my king upon Zion.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[נִסַּכְתִּי]] Pr 8:23 I was installed (of Wisdom).
